artist: Engraver: Thomas Goff Lupton; Painter: Nicolaes Maes; Publisher: W. B. Cooke
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscription
below image in black: Painted by Maes   Engraved by Thomas Lupton/ The Surprise/ In the possession of His Majesty/ Gems of Art, Plate 16, Published July 1, 1824 by W. B. Cooke 9 Soho Square | in pencil below inscription: 2-2
title: The Surprise
